<a id="VideoStreamPlayer"></a>

# VideoStreamPlayer

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A control used for video playback.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A control used for playback of [VideoStream](VideoStream.md) resources.

Supported video formats are [Ogg Theora](https://www.theora.org/) (``.ogv``, [VideoStreamTheora](VideoStreamTheora.md)) and any format exposed via a GDExtension plugin.

\ **Warning:** On Web, video playback *will* perform poorly due to missing architecture-specific assembly optimizations.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Playing videos](../tutorials/animation/playing_videos.md)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_audio_track"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **audio_track** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_audio_track)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_audio_track**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_audio_track**\ (\ )

The embedded audio track to play.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_autoplay"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **autoplay** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_autoplay)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_autoplay**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **has_autoplay**\ (\ )

If ``true``, playback starts when the scene loads.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_buffering_msec"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **buffering_msec** = `500` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_buffering_msec)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_buffering_msec**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_buffering_msec**\ (\ )

Amount of time in milliseconds to store in buffer while playing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_bus"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **bus** = `&"Master"` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_bus)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bus**\ (\ value\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ )
- [StringName](StringName.md) **get_bus**\ (\ )

Audio bus to use for sound playback.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_expand"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **expand** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_expand)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_expand**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **has_expand**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the video scales to the control size. Otherwise, the control minimum size will be automatically adjusted to match the video stream's dimensions.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_loop"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **loop** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_loop)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_loop**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **has_loop**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the video restarts when it reaches its end.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_paused"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **paused** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_paused)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_paused**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_paused**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the video is paused.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_speed_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **speed_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_speed_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_speed_scale**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_speed_scale**\ (\ )

The stream's current speed scale. ``1.0`` is the normal speed, while ``2.0`` is double speed and ``0.5`` is half speed. A speed scale of ``0.0`` pauses the video, similar to setting [paused](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_property_paused) to ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_stream"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[VideoStream](VideoStream.md) **stream** [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_stream)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stream**\ (\ value\: [VideoStream](VideoStream.md)\ )
- [VideoStream](VideoStream.md) **get_stream**\ (\ )

The assigned video stream. See description for supported formats.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_stream_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **stream_position** [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_stream_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stream_position**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_stream_position**\ (\ )

The current position of the stream, in seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_volume"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **volume** [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_volume)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_volume**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_volume**\ (\ )

Audio volume as a linear value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_property_volume_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **volume_db** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_property_volume_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_volume_db**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_volume_db**\ (\ )

Audio volume in dB.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_method_get_stream_length"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_stream_length**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_method_get_stream_length)

The length of the current stream, in seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_method_get_stream_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_stream_name**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_method_get_stream_name)

Returns the video stream's name, or ``"&lt;No Stream&gt;"`` if no video stream is assigned.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_method_get_video_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_video_texture**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_method_get_video_texture)

Returns the current frame as a [Texture2D](Texture2D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_method_is_playing"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_playing**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_method_is_playing)

Returns ``true`` if the video is playing.

\ **Note:** The video is still considered playing if paused during playback.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_method_play"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **play**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_method_play)

Starts the video playback from the beginning. If the video is paused, this will not unpause the video.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayer_method_stop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **stop**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayer_method_stop)

Stops the video playback and sets the stream position to 0.

\ **Note:** Although the stream position will be set to 0, the first frame of the video stream won't become the current frame.
